}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :Dell P/N: '''D4V21, 0D4V21'''
[[QCA]] Model: [[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344AH|QCNFA344AH]] (NGFF M.2 2230 Key A/E) *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCNFA344AH PPD-QCNFA344AH] (08/21/2015) :[[Foxconn]] T77H644.00 (Hon Hai) :NGFF M.2 2230-S3-A-E
===Specifications=== :‧ Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A :‧ Standard: 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R (867Mbps) MU-MIMO :‧ Interface: M.2 Card (PCIe: WLAN; USB 2.0: Bluetooth) :‧ Bluetooth: 4.1, 4.0 LE, 3.0 + HS, 2.1 + EDR :‧ Antenna: 2x IPEX MHF4 connector, 2T2R with RX diversity :‧ Enhanced wireless security: WEP, WPA, WPA2, WPS, 802.1x :‧ Concurrent Wi-Fi and BT co-existence
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:DW1820_front.jpg File:DW1820_rear.jpg </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
